= Using Affiliate Banner Rotating =
 I setup a simple banner rotator that I host on App Engine. As you can see above and at the bottom, the affiliate ads that load in order. I set this up this quickly because, I can't use Adsense in a Gadget Iframe in this wiki.

 * [http://affadpublish.appspot.com/adpublish Demo] - see the demo of the banner rotator. Refresh it to see serialized loading.
 * [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-examples/source/browse/trunk/AdPublisher/src/com/gonevertical/ads/server/servlet/AdPublish.java Source] - see the source (and project)
